sections.title: Guild Poisoner (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Guild Poisoner class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Guild poisoners gain no additional weapon or armor proficiencies beyond their base class.

sections.title: Master Poisoner ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Adds half level to Craft (alchemy) checks for poison and allows changing poison type with 1 hour of work using an alchemist's lab.

sections.title: Poison Resistance ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Provides scaling bonuses on poison saves, starting at +2 and eventually granting total immunity at 9th level.

sections.title: Quick Poisoning ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Allows poisoning a weapon as a move action and creates poisons in half the normal time.

sections.title: Toxic Apothecary (Ex and Sp) (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Grants at-will detect poison as a swift action and bonuses to Heal checks when treating poison.

sections.title: Toxic Trick (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Special abilities usable a limited number of times per day, including poison manipulation, bombs, and traps.

sections.title: Toxic Manufactory ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Allows creating multiple doses of poisons or antitoxins simultaneously and accelerates crafting progress calculations.

sections.title: Trapster ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Adds class level to trap-related skill checks and provides bonuses to poisoned traps created.

sections.title: Sneak Attack ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Functions like rogue sneak attack, dealing extra damage to flanked or flat-footed opponents, scaling with level.

sections.title: Treacherous Toxin ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Allows trading sneak attack damage dice to increase the save DC of poison on a sneak attack.

sections.title: Swift Poisoning ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Allows drawing and applying poison to a weapon as a swift action without provoking attacks of opportunity.

sections.title: Instantaneous Toxicology ([Ex](https://www.d20pfsrd.com/magic#TOC-Extraordinary-Abilities-Ex-)) (Guild Poisoner)
sections.description: Enables creating poisons as a full-round action that last temporarily, or unstable toxins at reduced cost that expire quickly.
